column1: # "atomic" remix, providing machines to transform one material into another
# This package, if available, produces an optimised version of vapourise.csv, writing a new file
#   in the same folder. In testing, it reduces the size of decorations.csv by about 50%
#   - Uncomment the line below by removing the initial #
#   - Start a Minetest game, using the "atomic" remix, then shut down the client
#   - In the "atomic" remix folder, rename the original file to something like
#   - Comment the line below by re-inserting the initial #
# The "elements" remix specifies packages providing all 118 elements of the periodic table
# As normal, iron lumps produce steel ingots/powder
